#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
int x,y,rn,count;
int main() {

	scanf("%d %d", &x,&y);
	while(x+y) {

		while(x+y+rn) {
			rn=x%10+y%10+rn;
			if(rn>9) count++;
			rn=rn/10;
			x=x/10;
			y=y/10;
		}


		if(count==1) printf("1 carry operation.\n");
		else if(count==0) printf("No carry operation.\n");
		else printf("%d carry operations.\n", count);


		scanf("%d %d", &x,&y);
		count=0;
	}
    return 0;
 }
